price: Je! Hawaoni ya kwamba tumeifanya nchi takatifu ina amani, na hali watu wengine wananyakuliwa kote kwa majirani zao? Je! Wanaamini upotovu, na neema za Mwenyezi Mungu wanazikataa?
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَرَوۡاْ أَنَّا جَعَلۡنَا حَرَمًا ءَامِنٗا وَيُتَخَطَّفُ ٱلنَّاسُ مِنۡ حَوۡلِهِمۡۚ أَفَبِٱلۡبَٰطِلِ يُؤۡمِنُونَ وَبِنِعۡمَةِ ٱللَّهِ يَكۡفُرُونَ

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: awalam yaraw annā jaʿalnā ḥaraman āminan wayutakhaṭṭafu al-nāsu min ḥawlihim afabil-bāṭili yu'minūna wabiniʿ'mati al-lahi yakfurūna
